title: Someone on the Show Gets A BIG Surprise! + Phone Screener Abby Shares Her Studio Recorded Version of The National Anthem + Amy Saw An A-List Celeb at a Coffee Shop
itunes:title: Someone on the Show Gets A BIG Surprise! + Phone Screener Abby Shares Her Studio Recorded Version of The National Anthem + Amy Saw An A-List Celeb at a Coffee Shop
description:
Bobby reveals who the “big surprise” is for on the show. Something we knew was coming…but not this early! Phone Screener Abby went into a record studio to get a professional version of her singing the National Anthem. We talked to our station program director in Virginia to see if he will play it on their station along with other station versions. Amy reveals that she saw an A-List celebrity at a coffee show. Someone she’d never think she’d run into in her entire life.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
